name: Operation: Matriarchy
description: Operation: Matriarchy is a science fiction first-person shooter. In the 24th century mankind has formed itself into the Federation of Earth, and has colonized several other planets. However, around 2350 a mysterious virus ravages the colony planet of Velia, targeting only the females within the population.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 8.1 Processor: Pentium 4 or better Memory: 514 MB RAM Graphics: Athlon XP 1.5 Ghz DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space

reviews.review_text: i always saw footage of this game but was never able to play it till now and i gotta say i love it. its just so different ( story wise ) and the gameplay is average but it kinda reminds me of system shock in a way also sure its a simple fps for some people but i feel like they were trying to make this game big and into a series which could have been possiable if they had just tooken a little more time and effert into the story and game over all still i say its worth getting and if you disagree at least buy it when its on sale or something
